subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Rangers seem to have no way to stop Penguins center Evgeni Malkin, who scored two power-play goals, added an assist and won a face-off that led to another goal on Tuesday.
snippet: The Rangers seem to have no way to stop Penguins center Evgeni Malkin, who scored two power-play goals, added an assist and won a face-off that led to another goal on Tuesday.
